activities: As a data controller GitHub, Inc. ("GitHub") processes personal information relating to natural persons in the EU/EEA and Switzerland who are employees or contractors of GitHub or individual contacts of corporate customers. As a data processor, GitHub provides web hosting and technical services, human resources, sales support, and technical services. The personal information described above is collected, held and processed for different purposes, which may include any of the following: sales and marketing to businesses; effecting transactions with businesses; supplying services and/or products to such businesses; financial processing and management; supplier relationship management; customer support and customer relationship management; and human resources purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Science & Technology - (GST)Information Services - (INF)Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Organizational and customer data, client data, user data, human resources data
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities; i.e., EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
